name: Cataptation
description:
(THIS IS THE KIWI BUILD!!! THIS IS UNFINISHED!!!)
Cataptation is a game in which you play as a cat named Mira in a post apocalyptic world taken over by an ancient metal civilization that came back to life one day, where you fight your way through underground dungeons on your way to find what little there is left of a civilization. Little do you know, you're not only here to swing your sword.
